Reviews.Title: Really cool phone
Reviews.Author: R. M. Coleman "La Petite Victorian Gothic"
Reviews.Content: So far so good.Getting an unlocked phone has a lot of perks, this is a really nice music and movie player, I downloaded some dvds onto my computer, edited them with a free video to cellphone program, so really this does almost everything the $300.00 phones do, just for much much less.So far, music player is great, videos are great, call quality is clear the only very small down side I can see right now is its slightly smaller than an iphone, so it will not fit any cell phone holster without padding, kinda annoying but other than that, you won't regret buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good music phone
Reviews.Author: Edward Diehl
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent music phone at a nice price.Pros:  Phone works well, unlocked quad band is great if you do not like to be tied to one company or travel abroad.Music player + radio work nicely.  Upgradable memory (microSD is very convenient) and memory is accessible as a disk drive on a computer so you are not tied to proprietary software to upload music.Cons:  Buttons are embedded under screen, take some practice to get used to.  Not the best texting phone.Phone is a bit on the large size - about the size of an iPhone.  On the other hand this means there are a wide choice of iPhone cases which will work with this phone.Phone does all that I wanted (phone+music+radio+quadband) so I am quite satisfied with the phone.

Reviews.Title: My Son was Happy
Reviews.Author: Rhonda R. Lee "Rhonda"
Reviews.Content: My son recieved his phone three days before scheduled and is very pleased with all the features. the item showed up as picture had stated along with all the wonderful features. Was getting a little worried from the feedback, so was very happy with the end results!

Reviews.Title: Nice alternative to the E8
Reviews.Author: Nathan Powers
Reviews.Content: This phone is the budget version of the Rokr E8. IT DOES NOT HAVE REAL HEPATIC TOUCH! I would give it 5 stars if it did. Over all it is the same experience as the E8 at a lower price.

Reviews.Title: motorokr em30
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: i got this for a my teenager step-son! he is only thirteen.... but we sometime need to stay in contact with him.the main reason why i bought this phone? it was also a mp3 player! and like most kids nowadays!they gotta have their music!!  it was way cheaper that a iphone! and he is too young to have one anyway!

Reviews.Title: very attractive look
Reviews.Author: Palls53
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my brother. Everyone liked it for it is having attractive look. I liked thethe dual-functioning keypad, which turns on to music keypad when needed.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone.
Reviews.Author: Kyanzasu
Reviews.Content: Came quickly, packaged well, condition as promised. The face is one solid piece. I like that. Makes it harder for liquids to enter the surface. This is a very good phone. I wanted two things on my phone, a camera, and a music player. This phone had both and they served me very well. Unfortunately after about a year of use, I dropped it pretty hard and the keypad stopped working. Disappointing. It was a good phone. I prefer it over the $400 touch-screen I have now.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone, great for music
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: This is a great low cost music phone. I love how the keys light up in music mode, it no longer looks like a phone, it looks like an MP3 player. And with a microSD card, I'm keeping tons of songs on it. It also has a regular jack, so you can use any headphones or earphones with it, and the radio reception is good.I've been having it for about a year now, and I've been satisfied with it. It did freeze a few times though, I think it was because of some intensive web browsing that I was doing at the time. I didn't use the camera that much, at 2MP the pictures are decent but nothing spectacular. Battery life is ok. Oh, and I could use it abroad without any issues, on different carriers, it's quad band so it worked.Of course, it's not a smartphone, but if you need a cheap practical phone for talking, texting, basic web browsing and most importantly MUSIC, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for Kids
Reviews.Author: TamaSamoa684
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best you can get without breaking the bank. It has a lot of really nice features that your kids will enjoy. the only thing that they might not like is the size. But, other than that the phone is great

Reviews.Title: Love my Motorola Rokr!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a simple phone to throw my sim card in. The phone has been durable so far. Haven't had any problems using the phone. The only negative thing I have to say about the phone is that the numbers aren't always lit up. Once the light goes off, the numbers go dark also. Hasn't really been an issue though. I don't have texting on my phone, but I'm not sure it would be the best for texting because of the lighting on the numbers.Overall, I like the phone a lot!

Reviews.Title: Motorolla EM30
Reviews.Author: ARIF MALIK
Reviews.Content: ONLY COMPLAINT I HAVE IT . KEY PAD IS TOO HARD. SOME TIME IT DOESNOT WORK. OVERALL IT IS GOOD PHONE

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Slava
Reviews.Content: The first one came opened(probably used/returned) and never worked. Exchanged it for a new one - still lots of problems. The phone is heavy - heavier then L6/L7, even V9 (with the same features). The phone is slow - some button pushes take seconds to process. Never been able to adjust the settings to my liking.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and Hurt!!!
Reviews.Author: jagyul
Reviews.Content: My cell phone before this product was the Motorola L9 which after some time went bad.  However, when I tried to replace it, I had much difficulty since the L9 seem to have discontinued.  And so, I purchased the Motorola Motorokr EM30 with great expectation that I was upgrading.  Though, this product operates well (clear visuals and sound) like my old L9 (yet to play the FM radio), I'm unable to send and receive text messages which makes the equipment almost useless to me as most of my friends and relatives communicate through texting.  As such, in the past weeks since receiving this product my communication has indeed suffered.  It shouldn't be too hard imagining that I'm not too happy with this purchase right now.  Therefore, if anyone can share why I'm unable to send or receive text using my new phone I would greatly appreciate after spending all this money.

Reviews.Title: The phone has problems
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: It'll freeze for a good 15 seconds at times, mainly when someone is calling, and therefor not allowing you to answer the phone, BUT it'll still ring. It has actually turned off a few times when i tried answering the phone. and the "2 megapixel" camera, sucks majorly. At the finest and highest quality, the picture looks like it's not even 1mp quality. Really though, the only GOOD experience I've had with this phone is that, the sound quality is awesome... when it decides to let you pick up the phone. I bought it about almost 2 months ago to replace my old Sony Ericsson. But even with the 2 years of use, i think i'd still prefer the Sony over this phone. Oh... and this phone screwed up my proxy settings for my text messaging and what not. I do like the fact that you can use the music you put on the phone as ringtones/alarms though.But Overall.. this phone is a piece of crap... 2/5

Reviews.Title: Moto EM30
Reviews.Author: ABC
Reviews.Content: Hi,The product is good, i have not received the specified accessories.Hence,i have landup to return.

Reviews.Title: Got charged twice for 1 ITEM!!! GRRRRRRRRRRRRR
Reviews.Author: Ana Cecilia Oreamuno "Tica Women"
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this Item or company I got Charged twice under my Credit Card company Twice for this Item, I am still fighting this.Once I have the account statement from the Bank I will get Back to you Guys but I Need a resolution since I only bought and recived 1 Item Only,Thank You.Ana Oreamuno

Reviews.Title: The cell phone you buy does not work properly as it should.
Reviews.Author: leydi
Reviews.Content: Adorama Gentlemen:It is a pleasure doing business with you I have always had good care of my concerns.I have a problem with the order number 6997239-1, in date 12/30/2009.The cell phone you buy does not work properly as it should.Ewe buy it and it seems like no good.I wish the same but changed to another, it works.I explain:The phone has damaged the keyboard flexThe cellular phone does not work the buttons below.Back button does not worksend buttonmenu buttonthe Options button, and so on.Can not make calls if you do not work none of the main buttons.Please wait to meet my claim and am not disappointed,My name leydi Aristy

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Candybar music phone with unique backlit keypad and integrated music playback controls
MicroSD expansion up to 8 GB; 2.0-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; FM radio; organizer
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTOROKR EM30 Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, MP3 Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Cherry Red)
